data.comment: Today's referee, Minoru Tojo, has blown to start the match.
Tokyo are caught offside.
In the minute 3, Tokyo have a dangerous throw-in.
Gamba are pushing forward but Ademilson's finish is wide of the goal.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Gamba drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shu Kurata of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Gamba.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 7, Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a Tokyo throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 8, Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In the minute 9, Gamba's Patric breaks free at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Minoru Tojo awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Tokyo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 12, Gamba's Takashi Usami misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
Throw-in Gamba.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 16, Gamba advance rapidly upfield but Minoru Tojo blows for offside.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Tokyo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Tokyo just outside Gamba's area.
Arthur Silva (Tokyo) strikes at Ajinomoto Stadium but his header is cleared.
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 20, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 23, Gamba are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Gamba.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Tokyo, close to Gamba's area.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Tokyo close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Minoru Tojo awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 27, In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
Gamba needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gamba drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Gamba at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Throw-in for Gamba at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 32, Throw-in high up the field for Tokyo in Tokyo.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in Gamba.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
In the minute 36, Throw-in high up the field for Tokyo in Tokyo.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Tokyo.
In Tokyo Tokyo attack through Arthur Silva. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 40, Gamba have been awarded a penalty in Tokyo...
Goal! Ademilson gives Gamba the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
Tokyo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Goal kick for Gamba at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Gamba have a goal kick.
Minoru Tojo will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 45, Joan Oumari is back on the pitch.
Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Minoru Tojo signals a Gamba throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Joan Oumari.
The second-half is underway at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 47, Minoru Tojo signals a Tokyo throw-in in Gamba's half.
Tokyo's Diego Oliveira gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Free kick Tokyo.
In the minute 48, Tokyo's Diego Oliveira is on target but unsuccessful.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In the minute 50, Gamba to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Throw-in Tokyo.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Tokyo drives forward and Adailton gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Minoru Tojo awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tokyo pushes forward through Shuto Abe, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Gamba at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Free kick Gamba.
Yosuke Ideguchi of Gamba gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kenta Hasegawa is making the team's second substitution at Ajinomoto Stadium with Kyosuke Tagawa replacing Hirotaka Mita.
In the minute 63, Tokyo make their first substitution with Takumi Nakamura replacing Hotaka Nakamura.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Tokyo push upfield but Minoru Tojo quickly pulls them for offside.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Tokyo.
Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
The away team replace Ademilson with Kazuma Watanabe.
Yojiro Takahagi is replacing Arthur Silva for the home team.
In the minute 75, Kosuke Onose is replacing Takashi Usami for Gamba at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Goal kick for Gamba at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 77, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Gamba.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
Gamba's Kim Young-Gwon has been booked in Tokyo.
In the minute 79, Gamba will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tokyo.
Tokyo's Leandro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In the minute 82, Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Minoru Tojo awards Tokyo a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
The home team have replaced Diego Oliveira with Kiichi Yajima. This is the fourth substitution made today by Kenta Hasegawa.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 85, Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gamba needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
Minoru Tojo signals a Gamba throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In the minute 86, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Tokyo.
In the minute 89, Important block from the Gamba defence as Leandro fires in a strike for Tokyo.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Tokyo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Leandro of Tokyo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Tokyo's area.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Gamba.
Tokyo's Kiichi Yajima gets in a shot on goal at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Gamba.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
